title: Ticket #1132: _CONDOR_SLOT evironment variable always 1 with hooks
description:
On 01/22/2010 11:38 AM, Ian Chesal wrote: > Anyone else using hooks notice this? The _CONDOR_SLOTID environment > variable in my hook jobs seems to always be set to 1 no matter which > slot a job runs in on the machine. > > - Ian

matt then discovered this chunk of creepy code: 

      // slot identifier
   env_name = base.Value();
   env_name += "SLOT";
   int slot = getMySlotNumber();
   if (!slot) {
      slot = 1;
   }
   proc_env->SetEnv(env_name.Value(), slot);
